title: Certaine excellent and new inuented knots and mazes, for plots for gardens, by which you may truely learne the art of drawing out any knot, according to the plot of your garden be it neuer so bigg the like not yet published in our language, by any author whatsoeuer.
author: Markham, Gervase, 1568?-1637, attributed name.
publisher: Printed for Iohn Marriott, and are to bee at his shop in Saint Dunstons Church yard in Fleetstreete,
